description:
The Invader Custom is a modified version of the civilian VA-3C variable attack craft equipped with added propellant tanks and thruster units. Notorious whale poachers operating in the region of planet Zola converted dozens of VA-3C variable attack valkyries into combat units using illegal weapons and other appropriated military hardware. During the events in orbit of planet Zola in 2047, http://anidb.net/ch10993 [Basara], UN Spacy pilot http://anidb.net/ch41155 [Gamlin] and Zolan military officer http://anidb.net/ch41832 [Liza] battled dozens of VA-3C valkyries operated by pirate forces determined to poach space whales migrating near the planet.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macross7/va-3c-custom.htm
name: VA-3C Kai Invader
